|brand = RPF |model = Raspberry Pi Compute Module 4 |submodelappend = yes |submodel = Lite (CM4001000) |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = SoM |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM2711; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A72 (v8-A) |cpu1spd = 1.5 GHz <!-- 1.2 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = 64-bit
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 0 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = Samsung;K4F8E3S4HDMGCL; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Broadcom;BCM54210PE; |eth3chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |eth4chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |sw_cpu = <!-- true, --> |sw1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |wan_ports = <!-- 1, --> |wan_speed = <!-- 10MbE,100MbE,1GbE, --> |wan2_ports = <!-- 1, --> |wan2_speed = <!-- 10MbE,100MbE,1GbE, --> |totwan = <!-- total wan ports --> |lan_ports = <!-- 4, --> |lan_speed = 1GbE |lan2_ports = <!-- 4, --> |lan2_speed = <!-- 10MbE,100MbE,1GbE, --> |totlan = <!-- total lan ports --> |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = <!-- Number of USB Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = <!-- DC Amps --> |pwr_vac = <!-- AC Volts --> |pwr_ac_hz = <!-- AC Hertz --> |pwr_amp_ac = <!-- AC Amps --> |pwr_poe_type = <!-- Type of POE --> |pwr_poe = <!-- POE Volts --> |pwr_poe_amp = <!-- POE Amps --> |pwr_conn = <!-- Connector Type --> |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = 5 Output Universal PMIC;MaxLinear (Exar);MxL7704;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 08/2020 |estprice = 30 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = 9SIAU62J2G8954 |asin = B0B6VKYF58 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = UK
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "RPI-CM4Lite-R1-3", "Raspberry Pi Compute Module 4" and "Made in the UK" are silkscreened on module top.
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM2711 @1.5GHz :Quad-core ARM (Cortex-72) *GPU: [[Broadcom]] VideoCore VI @500MHz :OpenGL ES 3.1, Vulkan 1.0, H.265 (HEVC) (up to 4Kp60 decode), :H.264 (up to 1080p60 decode, 1080p30 encode) *Memory: 1GB (LPDDR4) SDRAM *Network: 1x GbE port via connectors *Power Source: 5V via connectors
==Links of Interest== *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2020/10/19/raspberry-pi-cm4-cm4lite-modules/ ''Raspberry Pi CM4 and CM4Lite Modules Launched'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[https://linuxgizmos.com/raspberry-pi-cm4-launches-with-smaller-footprint-quad-a72-cpu-and-optional-wifi/''Raspberry Pi CM4 launches with smaller footprint'' on '''LinuxGizmos''']
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:Raspberry Pi CM4 Lite (CM4001000) Top.jpeg|SoM Top File:Raspberry Pi CM4 Lite (CM4001000) Bottom.jpeg|SoM Bottom </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
==See also== ===Models=== *[[Raspberry Pi Compute Module 3]] • [[Broadcom]] BCM2837 • [https://www.raspberrypi.com/products/compute-module-3/ PPage] :• [[Waveshare CM-IO-POE-BOX]] *[[Raspberry Pi Compute Module 3 Lite]] • [[Broadcom]] BCM2837 :• [[ClockworkPi Core A-06]] • [[ClockworkPi Core R-01]] *[[Raspberry Pi Compute Module 3+]] • [[Broadcom]] BCM2837 • [https://www.raspberrypi.com/products/compute-module-3-plus/ PPage] *[[Raspberry Pi Compute Module 3+ Lite]] • [[Broadcom]] BCM2837 *[[Raspberry Pi Compute Module 4]] • [[Broadcom]] BCM2711 • [https://www.raspberrypi.com/products/compute-module-4/ PPage] *[[Raspberry Pi Compute Module 4 Lite]] • [[Broadcom]] BCM2711 *[[Raspberry Pi Compute Module 4S]] • [[Broadcom]] BCM2711 • [https://www.raspberrypi.com/products/compute-module-4s/ PPage]
